official-title.#text:
To authorize a land exchange involving the acquisition of private land adjacent to the Cibola
			 National Wildlife Refuge in Arizona for inclusion in the refuge in
			 exchange for certain Bureau of Land Management lands in Riverside County,
			 California, and for other purposes.
